title: Figure, "Woman Mason", 1950–60

tombstone.epitaph:
Figure, "Woman Mason", 1950–60.
1950–60. Porcelain, enamel, gilding. The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds. 1989-41-214.
